transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanuman bol raha tha.
Executive: Haan boliye Hanuman ji.
Customer: Main keh raha tha ki wo video meeting pe aap thoda sa time de denge kal.
Executive: Kal subah rakho.
Customer: Mobile se ho jayega na.
Executive: Haan mobile se aap na.
Customer: Wahi aap rakho 10 10:30.
Executive: 9:30 nahi 10 baje ka rakh lijiye sir. 
Executive: Haan 10 baje ka rakh lo aap phone kijiye na ho jayega.
Customer: Ek ek do paanch minute pehle paanch minute pehle call kar dena.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Baki aapki Ranjit sir se baat ho gayi hai unhone mujhe bata diya kya kya karna hai.
Executive: Haan unki baat se main satisfied hu.
Customer: Theek hai kal subah morning mein hum usse kaam kar lenge fir jaisa hota hai fir aap mujhe bata.
Executive: Haan theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to schedule a video meeting for tomorrow.

- Confirmation if the meeting can be done via mobile.

- Request for a reminder call five minutes before the meeting.



Resolution:

- Video meeting scheduled for 10 AM tomorrow.

- Confirmed the meeting can be done via mobile.



Next Steps: 

Issue resolved



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

video meeting, schedule, mobile, reminder
